title: Text of a Letter from the President to Certain Chairmen of House and Senate Committees – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
February 25, 2019
Dear Mr. Chairman:In accordance with section 1221 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2018 (Public Law 115-91) and section 1231 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2019 (Public Law 115-232), I have enclosed a report describing the United States Strategy for Syria.Sincerely,DONALD J. TRUMP
